ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] As the Everquest Turns
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL. There are quite a few rl females in my guilds. But most of the people think I m a male. They don t know I m a female. Even when I m playing a female
ygData.messageBody:
LOL. There are quite a few rl females in my guilds. But most of the people
think I'm a male. They don't know I'm a female. Even when I'm playing a
female character. Kinda funny. Especially when I'm playing a male character
and someone who knows me in rl refers to me as "she".
luv,
-Su

I'm one of the very few females in my guild. Everyone always seems to figure
out I'm a rl female too...not sure why!
----- Original Message -----
From: LeSamLam@...
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, June 15, 2001 10:23 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] As the Everquest Turns


Do things ever happen on your server and you want to tell someone but no
one
you know will care? Does that make sense?

Maybe it's just because I'm a female and feel the need to gossip. I don't
know any females in RL that play the game. Only my husband and his
friends.
They don't care about the gossip of the game.

The funniest things I see go on between males and females. Jealously
mainly.
Female A gets jealous when Female B is flirting with Male A who "belongs"
to
Female A. Male C is married to Female C. Female C's alt is engaged to
Male
D. Male C doesn't like that Female C's alt is engaged to someone else.
Stuff like that...I find it amusing. Everquest could turn into this huge
soap opera. Who cares about loot, who's "cheating" on who? It's just a
game
and sometimes people really take it seriously.

And since we have a former guide (or where you a GM) on here I have a
question. When you get married and you take the surname of your
husband...can you hypenate??? I don't like his last name (my RL husband's
character that is). It doesn't sound "catchy" with my first name.

Ok and I didn't know you could get divorced in Norrath. I just find that
funny too. I might want to marry my RL husband's character just to
divorce
him. He doesn't take out the trash one night...I divorce him in EQ. LOL.

Ok so anyway.

Also, I wonder how many of Norrath marriages have one person being a young
14
to 16 year old male and the other either an old guy pretending to be a
female
or an older female.

What do you think the percentage of actual female players versus actual
male
players are in the game?

Lena
